Hi all,

Iâ€™m working on a side project where I am building a low-code platform. The logic will be very similar to HubSpot workflows. I have found a few libraries which achieve the diagram logic, but I was wondering if anyone know what does HubSpot workflows use on the background. From what I could find, it is closed source and custom made by HubSpot. But I thought to give it a try here anyway!
